Abilities.Name: Anaesthetic Saliva
Abilities.Description: If the saliva of an alp touches a target’s skin they must make a Stun save at -2 or be rendered unconscious next round. Golden Oriole renders the drinker immune to this.

Abilities.Name: Fast Charge
Abilities.Description: Alps can use the charge special attack at no penalties and can split their movement before and after one if it moves in a straight line.

Abilities.Name: Illusion
Abilities.Description: An alp is capable of instantly raising an illusion to make it look like a beautiful woman with features of its choosing, a wolf, or a cat. This illusion can be dispelled with a DC:15 Spell Casting roll.

Abilities.Name: Invisible to Magical Scanning
Abilities.Description: Alps cannot be detected by witcher medallions. Mages must succeed at a Magic Training roll against the alp’s Resist Magic roll to sense them.

Abilities.Name: Night Vision
Abilities.Description: Alps operate in areas of dim light with no penalties.

Abilities.Name: Sonic Screech
Abilities.Description: An alp can take its turn to let out a screech which forces anyone within 10m to make a Stun save at -1. It also has a 25% to knock targets prone.

Vulnerabilities.Name: Blood Transference
Vulnerabilities.Description: Alps are affected by any substances in the blood they drink.

Vulnerabilities.Name: Moondust Bomb
Vulnerabilities.Description: An alp caught in the area of a Moondust Bomb is staggered, takes 3d6 damage and has a 25% chance to be set on fire.

Vulnerabilities.Name: Touch of Silver
Vulnerabilities.Description: Alps cannot stand the mere touch of silver. Any damage with silver weapons is doubled and contact with it causes damage as fire.

MutagenRecoverySection.Description: Grants +2 to Critical Wound Chance rolls.
